name: Simple Series Vol. 3: The Mahjong
overview: The game has 5 modes in all! [Practice mode] to practice by setting a rule freely by one person 【Practice mode】, participate in the Mj league and fight by multiplying Mj points with CPUs 【Challenge mode】, compete against nationwide rankings by playing against the nationwide users and points 【Communication Battle: National Battle Mode】, etc. Various modes can be played! Also, since the play results are saved for each mode, you can analyze your goodness and disadvantage, such as the list of winning coins!
